definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Adamstown, capital of the Pitcairn Islands

sentences.english: Adams said no more, but he placed a new photo on his desk.
sentences.chinese: 亚当斯没有多说什么，他放了一张照片在他桌上。

sentences.english: Adams retired to his farm in Quincy.
sentences.chinese: 亚当斯退休后回到了昆西的农场。

sentences.english: McAdams describes as "a love letter" to the City of Light.
sentences.chinese: 麦克亚当斯形容为“情书”的城市之光。

sentences.english: Old Mother Adams next door couldn't pierce her daughter's thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁的亚当斯老大妈看不透女儿的心思。

sentences.english: All of the people including Mr. Adams gazed at them with surprise.
sentences.chinese: 所有的人包括亚当斯先生都惊奇地注视着他们。

sentences.english: Adams's main subject is the American West, the encroachment of the man-made on the natural.
sentences.chinese: 亚当斯的主题是美国西部，讲述人类对自然地侵犯。

sentences.english: Allthat time in the making, I never really understood the significance of what hewas attempting until that moment.
sentences.chinese: 直到这一刻我才体会到亚当斯做这一切的意义。

sentences.english: “Jim, prepare the sub-particle setting for initial hydrogen release, ” Adams finallysaid.
sentences.chinese: “吉姆，准备氢释放的粒子群，”亚当斯终于说话了。

sentences.english: It looks like something the Adams family would drive.
sentences.chinese: 那看起来像是亚当斯家族会开的车。

sentences.english: President Adams did not call for a declaration of war, but hostilities began at sea.
sentences.chinese: 亚当斯总统并未宣战，但是战争在海边一触即发。

sentences.english: but Adam Smith really had the basic insight.
sentences.chinese: 但亚当斯密的确持有最基本的观点。

sentences.english: Dilbert first appeared one day while Adams was entering himself during a boring business meeting.
sentences.chinese: 呆伯特最先出现在亚当斯无聊会议期间的自娱之作。

sentences.english: Thenext morning I felt a wall of tension around Adams.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，亚当斯整个人都紧张兮兮的。

sentences.english: Mr. Adams's pictures about the Galaxy were shown in a famous gallery.
sentences.chinese: 亚当斯先生描绘银河系的画儿在一家著名的画廊展出。

sentences.english: Adams, mystified by his creation, stared atthe screens.
sentences.chinese: 亚当斯此刻都被他的发现惊呆了，他双眼盯着屏幕。

sentences.english: Old Mother Adams next door has lost her cat again.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁亚当斯老大娘的猫又不见了。

definition: (military) line of troops encircling an enemy position/(telephony) outside line/(basketball) outside the three-point line
Abbas (name)/Mahmoud Abbas (1935-), also called Abu Mazen, Palestinian leader, Chairman of the Palestinian National Authority (PNA) from 2005
to hit the target with one's throw/(basketball) to score
